crazyballrun.game.gui.controls

Class CBListBox.CBListBoxSimpleEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • crazyballrun.game.gui.controls.CBListBox.CBListBoxSimpleEvent
  • Enclosing class:
    CBListBox

    public class CBListBox.CBListBoxSimpleEvent
extends java.lang.Object
    Inner representation of a CBListBoxSimple-event. It stores the event type (scrollbar/selection change) and the index of the list element (if the event type is scrollbar change, then this is the index of the first shown entry in the listbox).
